testcase.classname: As an administrator, I should be able to delete a loan record in the system via the API connection.
testcase.name: When a valid DELETE request is sent to the 'api/loans/delete/{{id}}' endpoint with
testcase.system-out: Given The API user sets "api/loans/delete/29" path parameters...............passed And The API user records the response from the api loans delete endpoint with valid authorization information.passed Then The API user verifies that the status code is 200......................passed And The API User verifies that the message information in the response body is "Loan deleted".passed
